original_title: Matara-bound lane on Southern Expressway blocked for traffic
original_body_lines: The lane towards Matara on the Southern Expressway has been blocked for traffic due to a road accident.
According to Police, over 10 people sustained injuries after two buses and a bowser collided in the Dodangoda area.
Meanwhile, the Road Development Authority (RDA) reported that the lane plying towards Matara was blocked between the Dodangoda and Gelanigama interchanges.
